subject: PING ME! Putting the NEW in Newsletter...
preview: Welcome to PING ME!, the latest news and bits from Clickatell.  One half down, another to go...  The first half of 2023 was full of activity for Team Clickatell, pushing forward with new product enhan

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Welcome to PING ME!, the latest news and bits from Clickatell.

One half down, another to go...

The first half of 2023 was full of activity for Team Clickatell, pushing forward with new product enhancements, new product packages, and big steps forward in making Chat Commerce even better. Read on... we think you’ll like what we’ve been working on.

In-Channel Payments

Customers can make lightning-fast, secure payments by simply tapping a button or replying to a message, without leaving the channel. The Chat Commerce Platform delivers a hosted checkout experience, card tokenization, and returning customer profile.

Keep scrolling for even more new platform features 👇

Use Our Platform Your Way

Some of the world’s most amazing brands use our platform to deliver all things mobile chat... from massive one-way marketing campaigns to full digital commerce experiences, all within the mobile messaging apps their customers use every day.

So, we created a new way for customers to get the most out of our platform, with 4 packages https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsqZ0, each designed with the features you need to accomplish your business objectives.

CONNECT LITE

Great for bulk, one-way SMS for one-time pin and other operational fulfillments.

Learn more https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsGH0

CONNECT

Enterprise-ready, global messaging features to deliver outbound marketing campaigns, OTPs, and other operational messaging reliably on a large scale.

Learn more https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsFc0

INTERACT

All the messaging power of Connect, to deliver two-way conversations with your business, through chat bot automation and live agent enablement tools.

Learn more https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsJT0

TRANSACT

Adds digital commerce experiences to the mix, from payment, to order fulfillment and delivery, unlocking the full potential of chat commerce.

Learn more https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsNS0

New Features and Enhancements

AVAILABLE ON CONNECT

New Template Categories

WhatsApp recently simplified its business-initiated message template categories to just two types - Utility Messages and Marketing Messages.

AVAILABLE ON INTERACT

3rd Party Integration

We integrate with several 3rd-party platforms to extend the functionality of the Chat Commerce Platform. If you use Salesforce, Shopify, or Zendesk, we can help you deliver more satisfying, personalized business interactions with your customers in both automated messaging and live agent sessions.

API Integration

Our powerful workflow editor, Chat Flow, provides the ability to call external APIs, either from a 3rd party, or from within your organization. Deliver sophisticated customer experiences, and automate business processes, with reach and convenience.

WhatsApp Message Templates

Clickatell’s live agent support application, Chat Desk, now supports sending WhatsApp messages that contain images, videos, and documents, as well as quick-reply and call-to-action buttons.

AVAILABLE ON TRANSACT

WhatsApp Commerce Messages

Showcase and share products and services with customers using WhatsApp Commerce Messages, to make digital commerce experiences in WhatsApp a reality.

In-Channel Payments

Customers can make lightning-fast, secure payments by simply tapping a button or replying to a message, without leaving the channel. Clickatell’s Chat 2 Pay delivers a hosted checkout experience, card tokenization, and returning customer profile.

We leave you with some bits meant purely for your amusement. Enjoy :)

Here is a short and potentially useful diversion about the legal responsibilities of the cat owner https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsQ60. 🏛️🐈

How bad is your Spotify? AI has an opinion. https://hubs.la/Q01ZWsRV0 🎶🤖

For more detail on these new features and enhancements, check out the full post on the Clickatell Blog https://hubs.la/Q01ZWt1D0. To learn more about the power of Chat Commerce that delivers superior customer experiences for forward-thinking brands, contact us today https://hubs.la/Q01ZWt6g0!

Chat soon,

Team Clickatell
